title: Leadership Practical Skills Enhancement: Exploring Social Workers' Informal Learning: Narrative-Based Reflective Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Participants can analyze peers' experiential cases to identify three types of informal learning (unintentional, intentional, reflective).
Participants can structure personal work experiences into narratives and derive two or more learning points from them.
Participants can apply three reflective strategies identified in peers' learning processes through team feedback activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
